name: ChaosDAO
shortDescription: Community org with a dedicated internal voting process and multisig for OpenGov referenda
longDescription:
## About us
ChaosDAO is a curated community of Polkadot & Kusama natives. Our members are involved with every aspect of the ecosystem as developers, community organizers, [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ChaosDAO) and YouTube educators, and as ordinary retail investors.

## Voting Process
As part of our own organization‚Äôs evolution we have developed a robust [internal governance mechanism](https://github.com/ChaosDAO-org/ChaosDAO_docs/blob/main/governance/OpenGov.md) to determine how our community will publicly vote on referenda. By voting on behalf of the long-time Dotsama community we strive to ensure that all votes we cast reflect the true best interests of our native ecosystem.

![ChaosDAO Manifesto image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ChaosDAO-org/ChaosDAO_docs/main/.gitbook/assets/ChaosDAO_Manifesto_600px.jpg)

longDescription:
## About me
My name is Will and I was a member of Kusama's council.  My council experience allows me to better understand the technical aspects of governance and appreciate the general 'values' of the chain.

I am also a well known within the validator community and operate validators under the moniker [ParaNodes.io](https://paranodes.io).

If you'll like to hear my thoughts on governance, please tune in to [AAG](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtyd7v_I7PGkXbJmKojrZ1KXwspR1JkpV) I make live appearances on the first Monday of each month.

## About me
My name is Anton Khvorov, I‚Äôm CEO of [Novasama Technologies](https://novasama.io) & Head of Engineering @ [Nova Wallet](https://novawallet.io).
Passionate to build new innovative & amazing
products, with a mindset to make the world a better place.

## Voting strategy 

I do support referendums focused on the core values of Polkadot (decentralization, democracy, interoperability, reliability), as well as referendums that are focused on brining the power of Polkadot to mass adoption (products with great UX, open source, etc). 

I do not support entities that are active against any of these values and/or human rights. 

I often express my opinion on Polkassembly, especially in the case of controversial referendums.
